helpers.name: Tag
helpers.description: Shows a hint word below the theme (e.g., 'Food - fruit')

helpers.name: Keep Highlight II
helpers.description: Wrong-position letters glow twice as long

helpers.name: Keep Highlight III
helpers.description: Wrong-position letters stay highlighted until typed

helpers.name: Heavy Letters
helpers.description: Vowels briefly pause the crusher when typed correctly

helpers.name: First Word Glow
helpers.description: All letters of the first word glow blue

helpers.name: First Letter Focus
helpers.description: The next required letter is slightly larger

helpers.name: Second Chance
helpers.description: One free mistake per chapter (letter doesn't count as error)

helpers.name: Breather
helpers.description: Crusher pauses for 1 second at the start of each page

helpers.name: Word Preview
helpers.description: Briefly shows the next word before it scrambles

helpers.name: Cushion
helpers.description: Fail zone is 10% higher (more room before crushing)

helpers.name: Auto-Punctuation
helpers.description: Spaces and punctuation are auto-filled with a small delay
